deployTxHash.description: The deployTxHash holds the hex encoded hash of the transaction that deployed the smart contract.

deployer.description: The address in bech32 encoding of the smart contract deployer.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block in which the smart contract was deployed.
The timestamp of the block in which the smart contract was upgraded.

upgradeTxHash.description: The hex encoded hash of the contract upgrade transaction.

upgrader.description: The bech32 encoded address of the sender of the contract upgrade transaction.

upgrades.description: A list with details about the upgrades of the smart contract.
